comment: I thought this class would be difficult but the professor made this class very enjoyable and easy to follow the writing criteria. The class consists of (Participation grade) Discussion Posts/Assignments & 3 Major Essays which are all doable online. An easy class to pass as Professor Rodgers is caring and gives clear grading. (Take her if possible)

Professor Rodgers is an amazing teacher. I took her for English 1101 and 1102 and the assignments were pretty easy. The essays Professor Rodgers assigned were easy with a clear rubric and I could write about whatever I wanted, I got to write about a Disney movie for one of them. I highly recommend her.

I had her for both English 1101 and 1102; she's an amazing teacher, and I really enjoyed going to her lectures. She seems passionate about teaching, and her lectures are simple and straightforward. She does take attendance, but she's not strict about it. She gives good feedback/criticism on papers and answers her emails pretty quickly.

Professor Rodgers made feel more confident in my writing than ever before. Her Engl 1102 process is a slow progression into a final paper, and each step feels important. She's always willing to help every step of the way, and encourages you to truly research what is important and relevant to you. Best English/writing class I have ever taken.

Professor Rodgers is super sweet! She makes the class super simple: all you need to do is show up to class and do 2-3 assignments per week. She gives you plenty of time to work on these assignments in class. Most of her grades are simply completion grades, so you should easily get an A+ in the class. I love her and recommend her to everyone!!
Great professor, and she is super sweet and great at answering questions. Very easy grader, just show up to class and do the assignments.

She was very kind and gave great feedback on papers. Gave opportunities for refining bad grades. Was very helpful about meeting the correct criteria on papers and was very clear about instructions for writing. great professor!
Very sweet, 100% would take again, easy to follow power points
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Caring--Graded by few things

comment: Very easy class and taking her again next semester for 1102.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Caring--Graded by few things

comment: She is an amazing professor!!! Your grade is built on three paper a variety of discussion posts and participation inn class. She is very caring of her students and when it come time for the due dates on her papers she will always have the option for you to conference with her. I 100% would take her again, best English teacher ever.
Very easy assignments and only about 4 essays.
best teacher I had at KSU.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: She is absolutely amazing. If you fail this class or even get a C in this class it is because you just didn't try. She makes this class so easy and she actually makes the class entertaining. I went to class everyday but you definitely didn't have to. She did give us 2 pop quizzes but they weren't really pop quizzes as she sent an email to remind us
the best english class i've ever taken, i've never done so well in english before. she's such a wonderful professor, will be taking her 1102 next semester for sure
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Mrs. Rodgers is very easy going and lenient with grading. She prepares you way in advance to make sure you have more than enough time to get everything done. She provides rubrics, examples, and so many other resources to help with assignment. Definitely recommend.

Professor Rodgers is so sweet and caring. We only took a few quizzes but they were all online and most of the time we had more than 1 attempt! She goes through the lecture and makes sure we understand and we even play Kahoot sometimes! I am taking her for 1102 next semester and I can't wait to have her again!

Professor Rodgers has been an amazing english professor! The workload is low and you are given plenty of opportunities to complete assignments. Her class feels very elementary, but when every other class you have is stressful, it's nice to have a class that's pretty chill. Taking her for 1102 and am looking forward to it.

Very nice and sweet teacher. She is understanding when it comes to difficulty one may be having with work. She also does a lot of group discussion or in class activities for students to not be sitting down looking at a board all day. Definitely recommend taking her!

She's overall amazing! She sticks to her rubrics and has an organized class schedule and plan. Really just go to class and participate. I don't think I ever did take a quiz or test in this class and she appreciates hard work. 10/10 would recommend
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria
